basic.description: This course is a one-semester survey of organic chemistry intended for students in nutrition and fitness (fitness option), or for students needing an overview of organic compounds, functional groups, and reactions.
basic.subject: CHM
basic.title: Survey of Organic Chemistry

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CHM 1045 and CHM 1045L and CHM 1046 and CHM 1046L, each with a grade of "C-" or better.
